122a3(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ lha dang / gru dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba
122a4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad langs par gyur to// sring mo de yang ting nge 'dzin de las langs par gyur te/ langs nas sa chen po
122a5(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas te/ steng gi bar srung la 'dug go/ yang de'i tshe lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur to// de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa
122a6(mdo sde): desame tog ut+pal dang ku mu dA dang / pun+da ri kas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gtor ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo the tsom sel ba la 'di skad
122a7(mdo sde): ces smras so// sring mo khyod de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba thob pa ngo mtshar ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma gsung rnam par rtog pa lam spyod cig/ bdag ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
122b1(mdo sde): thob pa ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni ma thob pas bskyed pa'o// 'jam dpal gang na slob pa yod pa de na ni dmigs pa yang yod do//
122b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba ste/ zhi ba ni zhi bar mi bya'o// zhi ba ni mnyam par yang mi gzhog ldang bar yang mi byed do// smras pa sring mo de bzhin te
122b3(mdo sde): skad smras pa bzhin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni ting nge 'dzin pa rgya chen po thob ste/ khyod ni sil snyan sgra chen po phyung bas kyang langs par ma gyur to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci chos kyi
122b4(mdo sde): dbyings la mnyam par gzhog pa 'am/ ldang ba mchis sam/ smras pa/ sring mo de ma lags so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci gang mnyam par ma gzhag pa de bslang bar nus sam/
122b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ de ma lags so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag la kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa thams cad de dag mnyam par gzhog gis
122b6(mdo sde): gang la kha dog ma mchis/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ dbyibs ma mchis mtshan ma ma mchis pa de dag gang du mnyam par gzhog ste/ 'jam dpal de dag ni rang bzhin gyis dus thams
122b7(mdo sde): cad du mnyam par gzhog gis/ de dag ni rmar mnyam par mi gzhog ldang bar mi byed do// de bas na 'jam dpal gson cig/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na lha dang mi'i sil snyan
123a1(mdo sde): dgrol na/ TI yid du 'ong ba'i sku 'byung ngam/ smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin no// 'jam dpal cinam mkha'i khams nI sil rkun 'di dag la sa yid du 'ong ba'i
123a2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo snyam du 'gyur ram/ smras pa sring mo de ma lags so// 'jam dpal de bas na 'di la chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs na 'di la su zhig sgra thos par 'gyur/ grang
123a3(mdo sde): la rnam par shes pa yod pa des thos su zad do// smras pa/ sring mo gang gis sgra thos par gyur pa'i rna ba khyod la med dam/ de nas sring mo de cang mi smras par gyur nas/ spras pa/ sring
123a4(mdo sde): mo ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur/ smras pa mi thos so// smras pa/ ci'i phyir smras pa/ rna ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sring mo the tsom sel ba des 'jam dpal gzhon
123a5(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po zhig langs te/ shing chen po dag g.yo bar gyur kyang / rlung na
123a6(mdo sde): sus kyang ltar mi nus la/ de yang rnam par mi rtog de dag kyang rnam par mi rtog ste/ rlung yang bdag gis shing dag bskul bar bya'o// snyam du de ltar mi sems so// shing dag kyang bdag
123a7(mdo sde): cag ni rlung dag gis bskul to snyam du mi sems so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa/ yang
123b1(mdo sde): bdag ni mnyam par gzhog go// ldang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo bar
123b2(mdo sde): snang de las bobs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug la shod cig/ sring mo des smras pa/ 'jam dpral bdag gi spyod yul du mchis kyis/ bdag la gzhan gyi spyod yul ni
123b3(mdo sde): mi 'tshal lo// smras pa sring mo khyod kyis bdag gi spyod yul gang yin/ smras pa 'jam dpal nam mkha'i dbyings ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod yul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
123b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ sems can gyi spyod pa de ji tsam pa de thams cad ni nam mkha' la spyod do// de bas na nam mkha' ni sems can thams
123b5(mdo sde): cad kyi spyod yul te/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i phyag rgya ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang las babs nas/ phyogs gcig tu pad+mo la/
123b6(mdo sde): 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ tshig kyang mi smra'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo de la 'di skad ces
123b7(mdo sde): smras so// sring mo gang khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag mi 'tshal bar 'dug ste gus pa ma yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal bdag ni gus pa ma lags so//
124a1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar ji nas kyang byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med pa de ltar bdag mgus mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la phug bsti bar nus sam
124a2(mdo sde): smras pa de ma lags so// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang phyag 'tshal bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis
124a3(mdo sde): lta bur dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro// yang smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ smras pa mthong ngo // smras pa ji ltar mthong / smras pa/ ci rdul tsam yang ma
124a4(mdo sde): mthong ba de ltar mthong ste/ de 'dra bar mthong ngo // smras pa/ de ltar mthong na ci zhig mthong / smras pa/ de ltar mthong na cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo // smras pa/ 'jam dpal grang khyod
124a5(mdo sde): cung zad kyang ma mthong na/ ci khyod mig rdul lam/ smras pabadag ni mig rtul ba yang ma yin no// mig lnga dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mig med pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
124a6(mdo sde): sring mo mig ni ma skyes pa yang dag par ma skyes pa sgyu ma lta bu ste/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i phyirade ni dngos po 'am dngos po med pa gang gis kyang bshad par mi bya'o// smras pa
124a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ci chos thams cad dngos po med pa'am/ smras pa dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin du ji skad smras pa bzhin no//
124b1(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sring mo de la 'di skad smras so// ci'i phyir na sring mo khyod bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar mi byed/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma smu/ rnam par ma
124b2(mdo sde): rtog cig/ khyod kyis chos gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med du gyur pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji snyam du sems/ gzugs skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam/
124b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam/ smras pa/ ma yin no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ mig skyes
124b4(mdo sde): pa'am bud med yin nam/ smras pa ma yin no// rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid skyes pa'am/ bud med yin nam/ smras pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams
124b5(mdo sde): skyes pa 'am/ bud med yin nam/ smras pa/ ma yin no// chu'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / me'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams skyes pa
124b6(mdo sde): 'am bud med yin nam/ smras pa/ ma yin no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ yi ge gang dag gis bshad pa'i yi ge dag tu skyes pa 'am bud med du dmigs sam/ smras pa
124b7(mdo sde): ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal 'o na dang / 'jam dpal ji ltar na sring mo khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar med ces ces de skad smra// 'jam dpal gal te bdag bud med du dmigs
125a1(mdo sde): sam skyes par mthong na ni bud med kyi lus de bor te/ skyes pa'i lus blang na/ 'jam dpal bdag ni bud med du'ang mi dmigs skyes par yang mi mthong na/
125a2(mdo sde): ji ltar bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar bgyi/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'jigs par yang mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang
125a3(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'jig par yang mi 'gyur na/ de ji ltar na chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la/ bud med kyi lus dor zhing skyes
125a4(mdo sde): pa'i lus blang bar nus par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni blang ba 'am/ mi blang ba'i phyir chos 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ yang 'jam dpal mig ni skyes pa ma yin/
125a5(mdo sde): bud med ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / skra dang lce dang lus dang / yid skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ chos gang skyes pa ma yin/ bur
125a6(mdo sde): med ma yin pa de ni 'byung ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyis/ ji srid nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ smras pa//
125a7(mdo sde): ma'i skyes bus ji srid nas rnam par shes pa'o// smras pa sgyu ma'i skyes bu yod dam/ smras pa/ de ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir na de skad smra/ khyod ci bzod pa skyes sam/ smras pa
125b1(mdo sde): de ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir na 'chad par byed/ smras pa/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus ji srid nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de srid nas bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
125b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro// yang ji srid nas khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed ces de skad smras pa'i 'dri ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
125b3(mdo sde): mi skye ba ni bskyed par mi nus/ dgag par mi nus/ gdags par mi nus/ gang dgag tu med pa'i chos de ni skyed pa'am dgag par mi nus so// smras pa/ tshul bzhin du 'dri ba ni gang / tshul de
125b4(mdo sde): ni gang spros pa/ mi skye ba ni tshul te/ de 'dra bar 'di 'dri ba ni tshul bzhin du 'dri ba'o// yang sring mo khyod bzod pa skyes sam zhes de skad smra ba/ bdag ni bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags
125b5(mdo sde): bzod pa ma skyes pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir bskyed par yang ma lagasa'adri ba yang ma lags so// de bas na bdag bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/ bzod/
125b6(mdo sde): pa ma skyes pa yang ma lags so// sring mo byang chub sems dpas don gang gi dbang mthong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can yongs
125b7(mdo sde): su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgo bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro// 'das pa'i
126a1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas/ ma byon pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi/
126a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ da ltar bzhugs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ sring mo ci'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/
126a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal mi byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ smras pa/ 'di la cung zad kyang byar med do// smras pa/ sring mo ci'i phyir na rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par
126a4(mdo sde): rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur/ smras pa mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ sring mo de su zhig yid ches par gyur/ smras pa gang dag ye shes ma skyes pa mi
126a5(mdo sde): 'jig pa'o// smras pa/ de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ smras pa gang ma mos pa'o// sring mo mos pa la yon tan ci zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal mos pa la ni rnam par grol ba'i
126a6(mdo sde): yon tan mchis so// smras pa/ sring mo khyod thogs pa med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal dmigs pa la ma spyod cig/ 'jam dpal gang du'ang chags
126a7(mdo sde): pa yod dam ci na/ de'i phyir bdag la khyod ni ma thogs pa'i spobs pa dang / ldan no zhes smra / smras pa/ de ma yin no// de bas na bdag ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no// smras pa
126b1(mdo sde): sring mo gang spobs pa zhes bya ba de ci la spobs pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ gang bdag gis rtogs pa de dag la ni spobs pa yod do// smras pa/ gang du rtogs/ smras pa/ gang du yang ma rtogs pas
126b2(mdo sde): de'i phyir rtogs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma rtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal yang grang dag gis ma rtogs pa/ bdag
126b3(mdo sde): gis rtogs pa'o// smras pa/ gang du ma rtogs/ smras pa/ khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ste/ gang dag gis khams gsum du ma rtogs pa de ni khong du ma chud pas rtogs so// smras pa
126b4(mdo sde): sring mo khyod kyis ji srid nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
126b5(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur bar de'i tshe na/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'jam dpal byang chub la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ thob par nus sam/ de nas
126b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang / sring mo des 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal cang mi smra bar bya ba dus la ma bab kyis shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
126b7(mdo sde): sring mo byang chub ni bshad du med na/ re'i phyir ci bshad ma 'tshal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
127a1(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di ni ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'di 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa ston par bgyid/ bgyid pa ngo mtshar na/ bcom
127a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das sring mo 'dis yun ji srid nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ ji srid nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di sangs rgyas
127a3(mdo sde): kyi zhing ji lta bur 'gyur/ 'di'i ming jir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo 'dis byang chub kyi phyir spyad nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi phrag
127a4(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa dang / de'i 'og tu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sring mo 'ongs gang gi drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs
127a5(mdo sde): pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i drung
127a6(mdo sde): du byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par gyur pa de dag bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bshud kyang / cha tsam yang bshad par mi 'gyur te/ sring mo 'dis
127a7(mdo sde): ni der byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gsol pa/ ci bud med du gyur pa lags sam/ bka' stsas pa/ de ni ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor lo'i sgyur ba'i rgyal po sgra dang bral ba zhes bya
127b1(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di la ni bud med ces kyang mi bya/ skyes pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// sring mo 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ste/ de ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar bdag gis lus
127b2(mdo sde): sprul par byed do// 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdul dang yal ga dang 'dab ma ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa grangs med pa brgya phrag stong gis
127b3(mdo sde): bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kun tu spang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyis tshogs
127b4(mdo sde): chen pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji 'dra bar gyur pa 'di yang de bzhin te/ lhag pa/
127b5(mdo sde): med ched pa med do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
127b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni bgyi ba mang ba bgyid pa mang ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la yang rnam par rtogs par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis
127b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ltar bdag ni byed pa mang ba ste/ de dag ni chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i phyir bde ba zad par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs/
128a1(mdo sde): pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
128a2(mdo sde): dang ma rtsod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni spobs pa dang 'dri ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mnyam par gzhag pa
128a3(mdo sde): gang la mnyam par gzhog pa dang ldang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhog pa de dag gi ming tsam yang khyod kyis mi shes so// de nas 'khor de na/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag
128a4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du gyur te/ kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
128a5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems sems kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul 'a zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
128a6(mdo sde): khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jam dpal 'dra bar gyur du zin kyang / sring mo 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul dang ye shes kyi brgya phrag stong gi char yang
128a7(mdo sde): mi phod do// ting nge 'dzin gang dag la sring mo 'di mnyam par gzhog pa dang ldan par byed pa'i ming yang 'jam dpal gyis mi shes so// rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
128b1(mdo sde): sems can ji skad yod pa de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang ye shes dang mnyam par gzhog pas the tsom sel ba dang / 'dra bar gyur du zin kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa/
128b2(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgya phrag stong gi char yang mi phod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gang la mnyam
128b3(mdo sde): par gzhog cing / ldang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag gi ming tsam yang sring mo 'dis mi shes so// rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pas sgrib
128b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur te/ ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gom pa 'dor ba yang mi shes te/ rmongs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
128b5(mdo sde): goms pa ci ltar 'dor/ ci ltar 'jog mi shes par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di ston pa'i
128b6(mdo sde): tshe/ srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bdag cag kyang ye shes de dang ldan par gyur cig ces de skad ces tshig kyang smras so//
128b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sring mo 'dis ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug te
129a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang
129a2(mdo sde): phyogs dang / phyogs bcun yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'dis/ sring mo 'di byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ sring mo 'di ji lta ba de dang 'dra
129a3(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// rigs kyi bu 'dis ni shar phyogs su byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go// phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du yang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu nga nyid da ltar
129a4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngam/ rigs kyi bu nga yang 'das pa'i dus na
129a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ nga ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs
129a6(mdo sde): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phyogs bcur byang chub tu sems bskyang du bcug ste/ de dag da ltar bzhugs so 'tsho ba zhes so// dpag tu med pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// tshig de
129a7(mdo sde): gsung ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
129b1(mdo sde): deng byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi rna ba'i
129b2(mdo sde): dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs grags par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang ma lhag ma chad par kun bzung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam
129b3(mdo sde): grangs 'di thos nas/ srog chags bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu'i ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab
129b4(mdo sde): tu thob bo// dge slong stong phrag bcu bzhis ni zag pa las lhag ma lus par sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga stong dang / lha dang mi'i skye dgu sems can khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug
129b5(mdo sde): ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka'
129b6(mdo sde): sprul pa/ ma pham pa khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shi// gzhan la yang rgya cher shod cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so//
129b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa ji nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ spyod par 'gyur bar khyod la gtad do// ma pham pa gal te byang chub sems
130a1(mdo sde): dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa 'chub bzhes paji skad pa dang / gang ma
130a2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang / spyod par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rtag par bzung na sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
130a3(mdo sde): rgyas shing / spobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag kyang yongs su rtag par bzang na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te/ sar/
130a4(mdo sde): bzhugs par gyur la de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/ bkur sti byas/ rim gror byas/ bsti sdang byas/ mchod pa byas/
130a5(mdo sde): shing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / yun de srid du mchod pa byas na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ ma jam pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
130a6(mdo sde): bdag gis dpe 'di thos nas/ sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ ma pham pa gang chos
130a7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan la rgya chen ston par byed cing / chung ngu na thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas/
130b1(mdo sde): kyang shin tu bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ma pham par da mya ngan las 'das nas gang bud med la la zhig gis sring mo the tsom sel ba de 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
130b2(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba de'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos sam/ chung ngun chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
130b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su spong
130b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan du yang mngal du mi gnas
130b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bud med gang dag bdag cag gis ming thos pa de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro// bcom
130b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom
130b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o// sangs rgyas 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / lo tsa ba ban+de dpal dbyangs dang
131a1(mdo sde): dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya brah+ma shrI b+hA ka ra Na na nA ma ma hA yA na sUtrA
131a2(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
131a3(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs gcig tu
131a4(mdo sde): bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// yang
131a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi phyi rol na/ byis pa phal po che dag sa rdul gyi khyim dang / sa rdul gyi ra ba dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing 'khod pa las byis pa phal po
131a6(mdo sde): che dag gis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang lhag par dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te rtse dga'
131a7(mdo sde): zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ gang na khye'u de dag rtse zhing 'khod pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs so// de nas
131b1(mdo sde): byis par dag gi nang nas kyezhwa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la drug 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du'o/ rnam
131b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mkhyen bzhin du byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byis pa khyed 'drin ci byed/ de skad ces bka' sras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khye'u de dag gis
131b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di nas rnal gyi khyim dag dang / se rdzas gyi rab dag dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing mchis lags so//
131b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsos to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i rmang du/ sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di
131b5(mdo sde): bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba'i sems thugs su chud nas thugs brtse ba'i phyiras
131b6(mdo sde): rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa de bzhes so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de/ yud tsamu de las rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i/
131b7(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug par gyur te/ de'i shar phyogs kyi ngos su ni gser gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ lho phyogs
132a1(mdo sde): kyi ngos su ni dngul gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ nub phyogs kyi ngos su ni bai DUR+Ya'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ byang phyogs kyi ngos su ni shes/
132a2(mdo sde): gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ lhag par yang ches dga' ba dang / mchog tu
132a3(mdo sde): dga' ba brgya chen po skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// k+She ma 'jig rten mgon po yis/
132a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul shin tu rgya chen bstan// bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyis ni rdzu 'phrul bstan// drang srong che la bdag gis ni// sa rdul khang brtsegs phul ba de// rin po
132a5(mdo sde): las grub par gyur// kye ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// kye kye shing ni 'di 'dra ba// sangs rgyas zhing ni bla med pa// mig med mig ni nyams pa dang // shes rab chung ngus mi shes so//
132a6(mdo sde): rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i zhing // 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa dang // dal ba rab dkon thob pas na// byang chub tu ni smon lam gdab// bdag kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis ni// yon tan rjes su/
132a7(mdo sde): slob par 'tshal// bla med byang chub thob nas ni// rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra bdag gis bgyis/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
132b1(mdo sde): zhal gyi sgo rnam yod gzer kha dog pa tshogs 'di lta ste/ ldan po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka drung / shal kyi bdog dang / dngus kyi 'dogs cu dug byu /
132b2(mdo sde): de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to//
132b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal mchog 'dren pa 'gro ba'i gtso bo rnams// rgyu ma mchis por 'dzum pa mim ngar
132b4(mdo sde): thugs rje ldan pa 'jig rten sman srad du// deng 'dir ci phyir 'dzum mdzad pa dag la gsungs// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' gro
132b5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das
132b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / sems kyis smon pa 'dis na/ bskal pa sum stong nyis brgya'i bar du nams kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi
132b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// des byang chub bsgrubs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar
133a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa yi/
133a2(mdo sde): bsod nams chung ngu skye mi 'gyur// chos mchog thos dang dge 'dun la// gus par byas pa'ang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa la// byang chub thob par dka' ba med// de phyir byung
133a3(mdo sde): chub 'dod pas 'dir// 'jig rten 'dren rnams mchod par bya// kun dga' khye'u 'di rkang gnyis kyi// mchog ste dpal dang ldan pa yi// mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba// 'jig
133a4(mdo sde): rten gyi ni 'dren par 'gyur// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin te// bsam mi khyab la dad pa yi// rnam par smin pa'ang de bzhin no// bcom ldan
133a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// 'phagras/
133a6(mdo sde): pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/

133b1(mdo sde): ta thag+sa rtsi pa'i phreng chunam ma hA spyan spadra pong gang du/ 'phags pa zam po mo pal snun mas zhus pa zhes bya 'theg pa chen pa'i mdo sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

133b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btu mang po su dang thabs gcig tu 'azugs sa denas snyom ldanas sa pa'i dus
133b4(mdo sde): chos gos dang sham thabs bsgrubs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma mye pa dang thabs gcig tu/

134a1(mdo sde): @/ bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ mi bskyod pa/ mi g.yo

135a1(mdo sde): srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug

135a6(mdo sde): lags na/ ma mchis par ji ltar 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang 'jig rten pha rol nas 'chi 'amabaka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan ma de ni ma
135a7(mdo sde): yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rnam pa mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ dpal ldan ma de ni med de/ dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni yang
135b1(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'byung gi/ yang dag pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung ngo // dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni phyin cig log gi rnam par 'byung gi/ phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par ni mi
135b2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rigs pa ma mchis na 'du byed rnams ci las 'byung / sdug bsngal yang ci las 'byung / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs/
135b3(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro nga'i rtsa ba ma mchis na/ de'i yal ga dang lo ma dang / yol ga phre'u ji ltar mngon par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa ma byung zhing mchis pa ma
135b4(mdo sde): lags na/ ma rig pa 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin te dpal ldan ma rang gi
135b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong na/ byis pa so so'i skye bos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa ma rtogs pa/ dag las mngon par 'du byed do// las rnams
135b6(mdo sde): yod pas srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed do// srid pa yod pas sdug bsngal myong bar zad de/ 'di la las mngon par 'du byed pa yang su yang med cing / srid pa mngon par
135b7(mdo sde): 'grub par byed pa yang med de/ de ni chos rnams kyi don dam pa'o// dpal ldan ma 'on kyang sems can rnams ji ltar don dam pa rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas/ tha snyad nye bar
136a1(mdo sde): bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sems can rnams la chos ston to// dpal ldan ma tha skad ni yang /
136a2(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la khong du chud par byed pa po yang med/ de la shes par byed pa yang med pa'i phyir ro// dpal ldan ma 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
136a3(mdo sde): pas sprul pa sprul la/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa des kyang sprul pa gzhan sprul na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang gcig ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// spru
136a4(mdo sde): ba sprul pa gang yin pa de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// dpal ldan ma de bzhin du gang gis chos mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pa de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa
136a5(mdo sde): slu ba'i chos can no// chos gang mngon par 'du bya ba de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// gsol pa 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang
136a6(mdo sde): nges par 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang / bskor ba ma lags pa'i 'khor lo dang mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i
136a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyis 'khor lo dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang / dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo 'di bskor ba/
136b1(mdo sde): nI/ nam mkha'i 'khor lo 'di bskor lags so// de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas tsan dan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la gtor nas/
136b2(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo nas mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo'i bar du chos kyis 'khor
136b3(mdo sde): lo de lta bu bskor bar gyur cig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi
136b4(mdo sde): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / le brgan dang
136b5(mdo sde): shes dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 'phags nas slar log ste/
136b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
136b7(mdo sde): po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum par
137a1(mdo sde): mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa/
137a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma pham pa khyod kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'dis tsan dan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
137a3(mdo sde): mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ma pham pa bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir ngan
137a4(mdo sde): 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas drug khri bzhi stong la bsti spang byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ de dag las chos
137a5(mdo sde): kyang nyan par 'gyur/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la yang
137a6(mdo sde): mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la 'god par 'gyur ro// de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na bdag snang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa 'am/ stong
137a7(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i
137b1(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong tshang par 'gyur ro// de sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gi don byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
137b2(mdo sde): 'das par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i
137b3(mdo sde): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa yod de/ bram ze mo dpal ldan mtha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas/ sngon bud ma
137b4(mdo sde): kyi lus nyid la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi sku la me tog gi 'phreng ba gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi sku la yang chos gos gsol to// de'i gsung
137b5(mdo sde): rab la rab tu byung nas lo stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// bcom ldan 'das de la zam mo'i gnas rnams kyang zhus so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la
137b6(mdo sde): yang zhal zas kyis tshim par byas so// bstabs pa yang byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la yang a ti mug ta ka'i me tog dag gis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las bslab pa'i
137b7(mdo sde): gzhi lnga po dag blangs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis mgron du gnyer te/
138a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des zla ba gnyis pashos gsol to// chags zung zhig kyang phral lo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs/
138a2(mdo sde): pa 'od srungs la ga ser gyi phreng bas gtor te/ 'di skad ces padag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma gyur gyi bar du bud med kyi dngos po las ma gyur cig ces smras to//
138a3(mdo sde): ma pham pa 'di yang bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang / bram ze

138a5(mdo sde): zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
138a6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ dI rmAn kha pa ri thA dza ka pa ri prid tshA nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ kun du rgyu ba sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/
138a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis
138b1(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/
138b2(mdo sde): bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to//
138b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe kun tu rgyu sen rings/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ khar ba la oM tshugs bcas te/ cang mi smra bar 'dug nas/ bltas te
138b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u ta ma 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya bar/ las kyi bsgo skal spyod pa/ las kyi 'ching ba can/ las brtan par bya'o zhes de skad smras pa ni
138b5(mdo sde): bden na/ dge sbyong go'u nyams sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma rdo rje'i lus dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni
138b6(mdo sde): ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar srog gcod pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u tams sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma sor mo ring zhing sor mo'i
138b7(mdo sde): bar dra bas 'brel par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u
139a1(mdo sde): ta mus/ sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u tams dbang po yongs su tshangs shing lus rab tu rgyas par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
139a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge/

139a5(mdo sde): bar 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos pa bag med pa'i gnas spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma so bzhi bcu
139a6(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing so mnyam la so dkar bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong
139a7(mdo sde): go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta mas tshul khrims kyi spos kyis lus byugs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga/
139b1(mdo sde): ma'i skye bar phreng ba dang / spos dang / thugs pa dang / kha dog 'chang ba dang / spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u nyams sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u tam

139b3(mdo sde): dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go lun ma ldan gsum la yongs su spyod/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i bye bar khri stan mthon
139b4(mdo sde): po dang / khri stan chen po spangs pa'i las de'i babras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma mgo'u gtsug tor 'phags par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/

139b6(mdo sde): te mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// mchod pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// kun du rgyu sen rings kyis 'khar bsal bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
139b7(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos la skyabs su mchi'o//

140b5(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
140b6(mdo sde): ni dpag tu med do// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lan gnyis su bcom

141a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lan gnyis lan
141a2(mdo sde): gsum du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med do// kun dga' bo de bzhin
141a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// kun dga' bo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dpag tu med pa mnyan pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs/
141a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi yul shes pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//
141a5(mdo sde): dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis mngon sum du thos na/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// de skad
141a6(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs
141a7(mdo sde): mtshams dag tu 'gro ba shes sam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu mchi ba bcom ldan 'das
141b1(mdo sde): kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod la don 'di dpes bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun
141b2(mdo sde): dga' bo skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag da pas don rtogs par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo dper na/ rdzing dpag tshad brgyad stong pa chus gang ba/ bya khwas btung du rung bar mu dang kha da

141b4(mdo sde): mu khyud kyi shing yang chu la mi reg/ rta rnams kyi rmig pa yang chu la mi reg/ pad+ma'i lo ma rnams kyang rta'i rmig pa dag gis mi brtol ba tsam gyi stobs dang shugs dang / mgyogs pa de lta
141b5(mdo sde): bus rgyugs la/ kun dga' bo de nas rdzing de'i nang nas sbrul gdugs pa zhig byung nas/ shing rta de mtsho'i nang nas phyir ma log pa de'i bar skabs su/ shing rta de lan brgyad bskor na/
141b6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo sbrul gdugs pas shing rta lan cig bskor ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su/ kun dga' bo khyod chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / don kyang go bar byed do//
141b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo khyod tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing / don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo mo'u 'gal
142a1(mdo sde): gyi zla chen po tshig gcig smra ba'i san rje tsam pa de'i bar skabs su gnas bca shA ri'i bra chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad don cing / don kyang go bar byed do//
142a2(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i bu/ tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su/ rang sangs rgyas chos bstan pa rnam bgrangs med pa bstan to// rang sangs rgyas tshig gcig smra ba'i
142a3(mdo sde): yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa skyon cing dron kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo
142a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ci tsam pa de'i bar skabs su kun dga' bo gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o// kun dga'
142a5(mdo sde): bo rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs
142a6(mdo sde): dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / byung shar gyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og gi
142a7(mdo sde): phyogs su nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar dung laM mi bso bar song la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rabs bskor te/
142b1(mdo sde): bas bsod nas rdo dang / gsegs dang / rtso ma dang / gro dum med par byas te/ mngon dman med par byas nas/ zong khyer gcig tu b+ha swA/ khyod zer gag tu
142b2(mdo sde): byas nas kyang yungs 'brus bkang ste/ byur bur byas na/ kun dga' bo grong khyer de'i nang gi yungs 'bru ji skad yod pa de dag pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na
142b3(mdo sde): sems can byang chub la zhugs pa dgra ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodapa
142b4(mdo sde): dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu skye bo dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang
142b5(mdo sde): ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'khod pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten
142b6(mdo sde): gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'chi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na
142b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dgangs mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal nas
143a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nA/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa dag ngas mthong /
143a2(mdo sde): ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang
143a3(mdo sde): ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi
143a4(mdo sde): khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems
143a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po lta ba dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la
143a6(mdo sde): gces par byed pa'i mchog dang / gus pa chen pos lan gsum bskor ba byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems
143a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi shing drang na
143b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
143b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo // de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag ngas mthong ngo //
143b3(mdo sde): de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa dag ngas mthong ste/ de dag thams cad
143b4(mdo sde): kyang mtshan mthun pa dang gdung mthun pa sha stag yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi snying
143b5(mdo sde): por 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po la skor ba byed pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dang /
143b6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa/ mtshan tha dad pa dang gdung tha dad pa dag lta ci smos//
143b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
144a1(mdo sde): mi 'byung ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji rnyed gcig mchis lags
144a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams ngas bstan pa gang dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang byang chub sems dpa'
144a3(mdo sde): rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni kun dga' bo dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i nang na gser gyi bye ma
144a4(mdo sde): dkon pa dang 'dra ste/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / byang
144a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni dkon te/ kun dga' bo ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma de dag las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru
144a6(mdo sde): gcig blangs pa de bzhin du/ gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig
144a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de dag ni nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
144b1(mdo sde): lnga la dang mi dang lA mA yin dang dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phagus pa gas gyi
144b2(mdo sde): ma lta pra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rin du bod dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / khru chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sngam
144b3(mdo sde): sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya many+dzu shri ba ri zid tshA nA ma ma hA na swai tra/ bod skad
144b4(mdo sde): du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
144b5(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i kun nas mdzes pa'i khang pa na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu
144b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / 'dul ba brgya stong mang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang po la
144b7(mdo sde): sogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la sku mi g.yo bar bzhugs pa dang /
145a1(mdo sde): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dbus/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ldan las langs te/ thugs phrag pa gcig tu ga par skye/
145a2(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
145a3(mdo sde): chen po gang gis 'dul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi drung du 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po de ji
145a4(mdo sde): snyed tshad ji tsam lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces
145a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal bsod nams chen po gang gis 'dul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
145a6(mdo sde): kyi drung du 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po de ni/ shes rab las 'byung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bskos pa yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jam dpal
145a7(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi phung por gyur
145b1(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po da/ brgyar bsgyur bas gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di lta
145b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang /
145b3(mdo sde): bdun 'byung ngo // de la bu sdong dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa rnams yod de/ 'jam dpal de ltar 'khor lo
145b4(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal po de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi
145b5(mdo sde): phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgyur bsgyur bas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang por 'gyur
145b6(mdo sde): te de ltar lha'i dbang po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che'o// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi
145b7(mdo sde): phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas gang 'dod pa'i khams su
146a1(mdo sde): bstan pas go bar byed pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po bdud du gyur te/ de ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po bdud ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing
146a2(mdo sde): mthu che'o// 'jam dpal gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la
146a3(mdo sde): gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas gang 'jig rten gyi khams stong byams pas khyab pa stong
146a4(mdo sde): gis bdag po tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gis 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang
146a5(mdo sde): ldan par gyur la gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams su gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas gang stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
146a6(mdo sde): byams pas khyab pa stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nA/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gnyis
146a7(mdo sde): kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du
146b1(mdo sde): bsgyur bas gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab pa/ tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen
146b2(mdo sde): po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po mchog la ltos nam bskal pa 'jig pa na/ bskal pa'i chu 'byung ba de'i tshe phyis par gyi bskal
146b3(mdo sde): pa gcig tu chur 'bab cing chu'i thig pa 'byung ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus gang bar byed de/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du chus gang bar
146b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chu'i thigs pa de dag thams cad kyang tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po mchog des shes so// de ltar ye shes chen po dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che mthu che ba yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
146b5(mdo sde): chung ngus ni dbang phyug chen por mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gsum gyi stong chen po
146b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bdag po// tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de
146b7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas mthu chen po thob pa'i rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta re shig zhog ste
147a1(mdo sde): bya bya/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ rang sangs rgyas mthu
147a2(mdo sde): chen po thob pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur la gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar
147a3(mdo sde): bsgyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha mar gyur pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can sgo nga las
147a4(mdo sde): skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes
147a5(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha mar gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la
147a6(mdo sde): gang sems can de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spu'i khung bu
147a7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spu'i khung bu brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang spu'i khung bu thams
147b1(mdo sde): cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po//
147b2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gtogs pa'i
147b3(mdo sde): gang bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur ba sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gam zhabs gcig ri mo rjes kyi mtshan
147b4(mdo sde): du 'gyur ro// de ltar ri mo rjes kyi mtshan brgyad cu la/ 'di lta ste/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / 'phreng ba dang / kyo ba thang dang / cod pa Na dang / dbyig
147b5(mdo sde): to dang / bum pa dang / glang po dang / rta dang / stag dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / rma bya dang / ka la bing+ga dang / shang shang te'u dang / tsA sha dang / dur pa
147b6(mdo sde): dang ne tso dang / ngang pa dang / thi ba dang / nas dang / sman chen po dang / 'od ma dang / ba man dang / klu dang / ra dang / khyu mchog dang / ri dang / bil ba dang / shing
147b7(mdo sde): dang ri dgas nags po dang / nor bu rin po che dang / ral gri mchog dang / rdo rje dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag ti dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ga sho la dang
148a1(mdo sde): gtun dang / sU wi dang / zhags pa dang / gru dang / mu tig gi brgyan dang / sprin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'khor bsrungs po dang chug/
148a2(mdo sde): dang / 'phags skyes padang / khrig mi ba pa dang / da d+hi dang / da dang / thab dang / skyedang / rlung dang / brjod du/
148a3(mdo sde): drung dang / grwa gsum dang / dge ba'i stan dang / me long dang / rnga yab dang / rtswa ngur ba dang / pra rod sha dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang rnga dang drang dang / mri dang ga dang /
148a4(mdo sde): gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / sor gdub dang / rnam byang bral chan dang/ matog bzang po dang / dpag bsam shing dang 'khor lo'i dpung gi seng ge dang
148a5(mdo sde): 'di rnams ni ri mo'i rjes kyi mtshan brgyad cu yin te/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal gang mtshan brgyad cu'i ri mor gtogs
148a6(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig tu
148a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis re rer 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dbu'i gtsug tor dang / dbu skra mthon mthing la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /
148b1(mdo sde): dpral ba mnyam pa dang / kha dog gis brgyan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma 'dra ba dang / so bzhi bcu thugs bzang ba dang / mche/
148b2(mdo sde): ba dkar ba dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / lce che zhing srab pa dang / ro snod seng ge 'dra ba dang / shIng n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / spu khung bu re re nas skye ba dang / pho mtshan
148b3(mdo sde): mi snang bar nub pa dang / brla gang zhing sdum pa dang / byin pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po a ne ya 'dra ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa che ba dang / zhabs dang phyag gi mthil 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang
148b4(mdo sde): zhabs dang phyag gi sor mo'i bar dra bas 'brel ba dang / zhabs dang phyag gi sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi steng mtho ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / dpung mgo zlum pa dang / mdun
148b5(mdo sde): mtho ba dang / lpag pa srab la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba dang / ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lhang la reg pa dang / zhabs rab tu gnas pa dang / zhabs dang phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo'i
148b6(mdo sde): mtshan yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / 'di dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal skyes bu chen
148b7(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang bar gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de grangs med par bsgyur ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgyur ba dang / dpag/
149a1(mdo sde): tu med par bsgyur ba dang / brjod du med par bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung du 'gyur ro// chos kyi dung des 'dul ba'i dbang du de bzhin gshegs pa/
149a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med par dbyangs kyis rig par byed do// dbyangs kyis ji lta ba bzhin du 'od dang sras kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de ltar shes rab chen po las byung ba
149a3(mdo sde): snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pas/ thabs mkhas pa dang / smon lam gyis bskyed pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bsgoms pa'i khyad par las yang dag par skyes pas bsod
149a4(mdo sde): nams chen po 'di dag ni/ nyan thos ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jam dpel rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du
149a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa yin no// rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ smon lam gyi dbang dang dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang ngo // 'jam dpal rgyu gonyis kyis ni
149a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos bstan
149a7(mdo sde): pa yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'od kyang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal ji
149b1(mdo sde): lngar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od khyad par du 'phags pa de bzhin du spyod pa yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni skus 'jig rten thams cad du khyab pa/
149b2(mdo sde): yin te/ 'jam dpal kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod pa'i bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod pa'i bye brag de dang de lta bu
149b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal mtshan gyi bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba mtshan gyi bye brag de dang de lta bur de bzhin
149b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de dang de lta bur de bzhin
149b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos ston par sems can rnams kyis shes so// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug pa dang 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i
149b6(mdo sde): spyod pa de dang de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnas par sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
149b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'gyur ba yang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dang skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
150a1(mdo sde): phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir skye'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs/
150a2(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das badrug gi sa ston pa mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa gang zag zla med pa khams
150a3(mdo sde): gsum na mgon po'i mchog/ sems can thams cad la ban par mdzad 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mi spyod pa nam mkha' ltar mi gos pa bsam gyis mi khyad pa
150a4(mdo sde): bsam par 'os pa/ lha 'dod pa blta na sdug pa 'di 'dra ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do// bde bar gshegs pa rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do// bcom ldan
150a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
150a6(mdo sde): bshad pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis rdos pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar
150a7(mdo sde): skad du/ nan da pra pra dz+nya sU tra/ bod skad du dga' bo rab tu 'byung ba'i mdo/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
150b1(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang shar thabs/
150b2(mdo sde): bsnabs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so//
150b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dga' bos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
150b4(mdo sde): rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so// bcom ldan
150b5(mdo sde): 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te
150b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung
150b7(mdo sde): dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig don ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sdig pa thams cad yongs su
151a1(mdo sde): spong ba yin no// 'dod chags dang / e ljang dang / gti mug ra tu sel ba yin no// 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang 'chang 'ju ba dang / da
151a2(mdo sde): dang 'gyed pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo'i mun pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no// lo tog thams cad kyi sa gzhi lta bur yon tan thams cad kyo gzhi yin no//
151a3(mdo sde): rin po chemam la rdzi 'byung gnas yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu yin no// yon tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin no// sems can thams
151a4(mdo sde): cad dra dwags 'byin pa yin no// 'drung po thams cad kyi yid brtan pa yin no// srog chags thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin no// sems can dbul po thams
151a5(mdo sde): cad kyi bum pa yin no// skyabs med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no// kun tu tshol bas 'phongs pa dang sdug bsngal gyis nyi ma thug pa rnams kyi bsti sa yin no//
151a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'dres pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin no// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no// thar par
151a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no// sems can dag pa rnams kyis bsnyen par bya ba yin no// snod du 'gyur ba rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin no// ngan song gi sgo gcod pa
151b1(mdo sde): yin no// mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo 'byed pa yin no// lha'i 'gro ba rnams kun tu 'grengs pa yin no// sdug bsngal thams cad kun tu gcod pa yin no// sred pa'i
151b2(mdo sde): bcing bas bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/ dgra' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khyim yin no// thar pa'i yang dag
151b3(mdo sde): pa'i sdom pa yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa yin no// rgyun nye bar gcod pa yin no// nyon mongs pa rnams smag pa yin no// prA rgyas rnams 'byin pa yin no//
151b4(mdo sde): lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba rnams 'jigs par byed pa yin no// bdud kyi rgyal mtshan stsol ba yin no// bzod pa smra ba bslang ba yin no// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par byed pa
151b5(mdo sde): yin no// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa yin no// nu zho'i rgya mtsho'i skams pa yin no// rus pa'i ra 'jigs par byed pa yin no// skye ba dang rga ba
151b6(mdo sde): dang na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' yin no// phung po'i khrur 'jogs pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin pa yin no// khyim gzeb tu
151b7(mdo sde): bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no// gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed par yin no// the tsom rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri mi brtan por gyur pa rnams
152a1(mdo sde): gcod pa yin no// ga shi 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no// sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa yin no// 'khor ba'i drug bsngal gyis gces pa nas
152a2(mdo sde): gyi bde ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i 'gram yin no// 'dod pa'i khams las bzhal bar byed pa yin ni// gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par brgal bar byed pa yin no// gzugs/
152a3(mdo sde): med pa'i khams lus yang rnam par brgal bar byed pa yin no// don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// 'jig rten pam/
152a4(mdo sde): cad kyi mig lta bu yin no// gti mug gi mun pa'i sgron ma yin no// rgyud dag par byed pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed po yin no// lam stor ba rnams pa lam/
152a5(mdo sde): kun du ston pa yin no// chos thams cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no// mdud pa thams cad rnam par 'grol bar byed pa yin no// marig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no//
152a6(mdo sde): mi shi swA pa'i rang rib kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no// le lo can rnams brtson 'grus lacom par byed pa yin no// tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yin no//
152a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog tu dga' ba yin no// nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams
152b1(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba yin no// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mchog tu chog shes par byed pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi mtshon cha yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams/
152b2(mdo sde): mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no// gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so// skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyong pa yin no// 'jigs pas 'brel pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs par byed pa yin no//
152b3(mdo sde): skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no// sdug bsngal rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad yin no// 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin no// dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba
152b4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// lha dang mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas pa yin no// mi'i dbang po rnams kyis mchod pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no// khyim gyi gnas yongs
152b5(mdo sde): su gtong ba yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dren pa yin no// sla'i khrur 'dreg pa yin no// gos ngur smrig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin no// rigs pa la
152b6(mdo sde): brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no// 'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no// bdud sdig to can rnams kyi grags pa 'joms pa yin no// lha dang mi rnams rab tu
152b7(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na/ ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid bde ba bas kyang ches khyad par
153a1(mdo sde): du 'phags pa bde ba yin na/ dga' bo gzhan yang dal ba tshogs pa ni bzhal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed par bka' ba yin no// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas
153a2(mdo sde): kyang ches rnyed par dka' ba yin no// dga' bo thar pa 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang / gzhan yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa rnams kyang btsun
153a3(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor dang bcas te bor nas rab tu byung ngo // de bzhin du khyim bdag dang / bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor nas rab tu byung ngo // denas
153a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni khyim par mchis la/ sbyin pa dag stsal/ bsod nams dag bgyi zhing bcom ldan 'das
153a5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang
153a6(mdo sde): bsgrubs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa gang
153a7(mdo sde): dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar 'gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las lo brgyar 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang
153b1(mdo sde): mal stan dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ dga' bo de ni byung bar nges par byung ba'i sems kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do// dga' bo//
153b2(mdo sde): khyod kyis rab tu byung / dal ba shin du rnyed dka' ste/ dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa/ nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig/ dga' bo dper na sa chen po 'di chu gcig pur rgya mtshor
153b3(mdo sde): gyur la/ de na ru sbal zhar ba gcig kyang yod/ de na gnya' shing bu ga gcig pa gcig kyang rgyu la/ ru sbal zhar ba de 'di snyam du/ gnya'u shing ga~M bu ga der mgrin pa tshud par
153b4(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing / gnya' shing bu ga can de yang rlung gis bskyod nas/ phyogs phyogs su rgyug par byed pa na/ dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig gos ru sbal zhar ba de'i mgrin pa
153b5(mdo sde): gnya' shing gi bu ga der 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo mi nyid thob pa ni ma yin no// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin no// dga' bo khyod kyis mi nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang /
153b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rang byung / dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig
153b7(mdo sde): dper na 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi mig gnam du bstan te/ nyungs dkar gyi 'bru rnams 'thor bar byed/ dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig gis der yungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig
154a1(mdo sde): chud par 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma yin no// ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no// dga' bo mi nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang
154a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// nga la mi mnyes ma byed/
154a3(mdo sde): cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal pa bye ba stong dang ni// brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang // sangs rgyas s+thA ni mi b+h+yos na// sangs rgyas mthong dag la zhig/ su dum
154a4(mdo sde): wA ra'i me tog ni// shing las shin tu rnyed dka' ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyeng dka' ste// khyod kyis nga ni rnyed 'gyur na// dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // dag pa
154a5(mdo sde): shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/
154a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang
154a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dga' bo dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// / 'di dka' dang por/
154b1(mdo sde): gtogs so// @#rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsin+d+ha rA dza sU tran nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bsdam gyis mi khyab pani/
154b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
154b3(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na/ chos kyi dbye dgon pa/ byang chub kyi snying po ni seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po ches spras pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i gdan la
