216a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la mchod pa'i dam pas mchod nas/ dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar
216a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa tshong dpon gyi bu mngon dgar gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po mdzes chen la brten te dang po byang chub tu ma
216a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa na
216a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa 'jog rten dbyung zlog rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon pa bstod nas/ byang chub tu thugs paskyed pa de bzhin du/ @#
216a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed bar bgyi'o// de sar btsum ldan 'das da zhin gshegs pa mi zhug pas/ sems thogs pa mchis pa dang / sems mjug pa dang /
216a7(mdo sde): cid kyis kyi 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung bab sems kyis mang ba'i ma mngon par zhugs / de bzhin gshegs pa ldan pa tu palas kyang chu tu zums ban
216b1(mdo sde): bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i dpal la dge ba'i
216b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnam pa mang po bskyed nas byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams pa rgyal po gser
216b3(mdo sde): mdog lta bur gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mchod sdong gi 'od la bkod pa du mas mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyis nas byang chub tu sems bskyed
216b4(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yul shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na
216b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi 'od zer mtha' yas la bkur bsti bgyis nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang
216b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod lhas dbang bskur te/ stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam thams cad las yang dag par/
216b7(mdo sde): byung ba rin po che'i gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la gdugs gcig bzhin du/ rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam pas mchod pa bgyis te bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur
217a1(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyis nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
217a2(mdo sde): pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la mchod pa dang / rim gro rnam pa du ma bgyis nas byang chub
217a3(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rdo rje rgya mtsho rgyal
217a4(mdo sde): po la sti stang bgyis nas byang chub sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// mchog dam pa nga rgyal zhing sems ma lags pa'i sems dang //
217a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems des khyad par ma gyur pa'i chos kyis dbyings de gang yang ma mchis so// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i
217a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs des dus gsum du ma khyab pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bgyid pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil
217a7(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su yi rang ba'i sems dang / sems bskyed pa des yongs su/
217b1(mdo sde): zin par ma gyur pa'i sems de dag gang yang ma mchis so// mchod par ma gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de gang yang ma bzhugs so// gang du sems bskyed de/ bskyed ma/
217b2(mdo sde): thags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni rab tu mang gi/ sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyan
217b3(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni de tsam ma lags so// bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa gang lags
217b4(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can thams cad la stsal pa gang lags pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
217b5(mdo sde): phul ba gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba gang lags pa dang / gang ye shes dang / mos
217b6(mdo sde): pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams kyi mos pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags
217b7(mdo sde): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / mos pa'i stobs las byung ba'i mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i
218a1(mdo sde): rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / sgrib par 'gyur ba thams cad sel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
218a2(mdo sde): gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos te/ bdag gir bgyi/
218a3(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thog ma dang po ma mchis pa'i tshe rabs nas bgyis pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su ma bsngos pa gang lags pa dang /
218a4(mdo sde): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dus byas kyi yo byad 'tshal bas mngon par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i slad du mngon par
218a5(mdo sde): bsgrubs par gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las kyis bsgrubs pa mngon gyi dus nas bsags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa
218a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad yongs su bsdu'o// yongs su bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sangs
218a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad mnyes par bgyid cing dgyes par bgyid par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid
218b1(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad dang chos smra ba thams cad mgu bar bgyid cing dga' bar bgyid par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa yang dag par/
218b2(mdo sde): 'dzin cing srung ba dang / yongs su skyong gyur cig/ sgrib pa'i ling tog thams cad rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig/ bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul bar gyur cig/ sangs
218b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / dbang thams cad thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par brtse ba
218b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par thar pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul bar gyur cig/ ci nas kyang 'khor ba ni mi 'bral zhing / tshe rabs gzhan du rjes pa na chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba dang byang
218b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo dang 'dre bar 'grib pa'i cha dang mthun par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de
218b6(mdo sde): dag yongs su bsngo'o// ci nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sangs rgyas de dag
218b7(mdo sde): la mchod pa bkod pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan par bgyid du mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan de'i tha ma'i sems bskyed pa thob pa yongs su rdzogs par dge ba'i
219a1(mdo sde): rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can
219a2(mdo sde): brkyang ste/ bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig/ ci nas bdag dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba bkod pa rgyun thogs ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
219a3(mdo sde): phyin pa yongs su bsgos pa'i sems dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa'i sems kyis 'chis pa'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ dad pa grangs ma mchis pa dang
219a4(mdo sde): rim mo gus par bgyi ba grangs ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba dang dad pa grangs ma mchis pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la lta zhing rtog la kun tu smra bzhin
219a5(mdo sde): du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ mchod pa yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
219a6(mdo sde): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing lha la rtog bzhin
219a7(mdo sde): du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig
219b1(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ lha'i bu thams cad dang / mi dbul po thams cad dang / ser sna thams cad
219b2(mdo sde): 'chal ba'i tshul khrims thams cad dang gnod sbyin sems can thams cad dang / le lo thams cad dang / rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad dang
219b3(mdo sde): 'tshal ba'i shes rab thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ byang chub tu sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang dge ba'i
219b4(mdo sde): gshes mnyen dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang lus mnyam par gyur cig/ ngag
219b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa dang / sems mnyam pa dang / ye shes mnyam par gyur cig/ ji ltar gong du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa
219b6(mdo sde): chags cha ba mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
219b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba de bzhin du / bdag gis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i
220a1(mdo sde): mchog gis yongs su bsngos so// gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rab dang phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa
220a2(mdo sde): dang gong nas ma mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / snang ba ma mchis pa dang / bdag nyid
220a3(mdo sde): chen po dang / bla ma dang zil gyis mi non pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad bsdud pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i yongs su bsngo
220a4(mdo sde): bas yongs su bsngo'o// ji ltar bdag gis don du yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can
220a5(mdo sde): gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyis khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di las su bdag shas kyis 'dzin par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang rjes
220a6(mdo sde): su yi rang ngo // zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dam 'cha' bar gnas pas 'jam dpal gzhon
220a7(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ rjes su yi rang ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / bskal
220b1(mdo sde): ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon
220b2(mdo sde): nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la 'cha' bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
220b3(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing / des yan lag lnga sa la gtug par bya ste/ des pus mo g.yas
220b4(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can thams cad g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par gyur cig/ ces brjod par bya'o// des pus mo g.yon pa'i lha/
220b5(mdo sde): nga sa la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i lam la gnas shing / yang dag pa'i lam/
220b6(mdo sde): la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des lag pa g.yas pa sa la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig gi 'di skad ces ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la
220b7(mdo sde): bzhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pas/ dbu dang sku dang / skyil mo dkrung la yongs su dbyugs te/ phyag g.yas pa sa la bsnun nas/ bdud dpung dang bcas
221a1(mdo sde): pa btul te/ byang chub brnyes pa de bzhin du sems can 'di dag gis kyang bdud chi rgol ba chom par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cings
221a2(mdo sde): chen po la bsnun nas/ sangs rgyas ky-i ye shes thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des lag pa g.yon bu sa la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su
221a3(mdo sde): dag byis pa'i chos la gnas te/ g.yon phyogs su 'dzin pa gdul dka' ba de dag thams cad bsdud pa'i dngos po bzhis shin tu sdud par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des
221a4(mdo sde): gdong dang bral ba sa la gtug pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can thams cad nga rgyal ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa rnams la rim gro bgyid pa snyed cing / spyi gtsug bltar mi
221a5(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / dge ba'i las thams cad 'phags par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel
221a6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su shes par gyur cig/ mngon par shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur
221a7(mdo sde): cig mig lnga yongs su dag par gyur cig/ sems can 'gro ba lngar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig/ tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags
221b1(mdo sde): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dang / shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba/
221b2(mdo sde): khyad par 'phags par gyur cig/ ces brjod par bya'o// des yan lag lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa lnga dang bral ba dang / stobs lnga la gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
221b3(mdo sde): pa yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku dang ldan lags pagasung dag pa gsung mi mnga' ba/ sems dang sems
221b4(mdo sde): mi mnga' ba/ ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa/ ma byon pa ma bzhud pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs
221b5(mdo sde): su gsol/ bdag gis 'khor ba thog ma'i mtha' mu gnas zung ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bdag gis mtha' ma 'tshal bas/ chos ma lags pa la chos su 'du shes
221b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / 'dul ba ma lags pa la 'dul bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / sbyin gnas ma lags pa la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba la dge bar 'du shes
221b7(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / phyin ci log gi sems kyis bdag gi sems kyis bdag gi lus su lta bas yongs su dkris pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang sangs rgyas kyis bka' ma stsal pa mngon
222a1(mdo sde): par 'dus bgyis pa dang bgyid pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bas 'gyur ba gang ci mchis pa de bdag 'chags so//
222a2(mdo sde): dmigs pa la gnas te/ bdag gis sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du 'du shes pa dang / sems can sgyu ma lta bur ma 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
222a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'chags so// bdag gi mngon par 'dus bgyid pa ma mchis par ma 'tshal nas/ lus dang ngag dang
222a4(mdo sde): yid kyis chos dge ba dang / mi dge ba mngon par bgyid pa dang / mngon par bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so// bdag gis sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod//
222a5(mdo sde): pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid du ma 'tshal nas/ dmigs par lhung bas sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
222a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / lus dang sems la gnas te/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'du shes dang
222a7(mdo sde): dmigs pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan skyed pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par dga' bas/ shes rab rnam par dpyad par gang
222b1(mdo sde): lags pa de dag 'chags so// bdag gis don dam pa'i mchod pa ma 'tshal nas/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la mngon par zhen pas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa bgyis pa gang /
222b2(mdo sde): lags pa de 'chags so// bdag chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i ye shes la ma zhugs kyi/ chos tha dad pa la gnas te/ chos mnyam pa 'am bshad pa 'am rab tu bsam par
222b3(mdo sde): gyur pa gang lags pa de chags so// bdag gis chos 'dus ma byas su ma 'tshal nas/ dge 'dun la mang por 'du shes te/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa gang
222b4(mdo sde): lags pa de bdag 'chags so// bdag gis dgon pa ma 'tshal nas dgon pa'i gnas bstan te/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang lags pa de dag
222b5(mdo sde): bdag 'chags so// bdag gis chos nyid gnas par 'tshal nas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan blang bar zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag bdag
222b6(mdo sde): 'chags so// bdag gis chos kyi dbyings yongs su bzung ba ma mchis ma 'tshal ma zhugs kyis/ sems can bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i bsdu bas sems can dag bsdus pa
222b7(mdo sde): gang lags pa de 'chags so// bdag gis byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal nas/ lta ba yongs su zhen pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom
223a1(mdo sde): gang lags pa de 'chags so// bdag gis dge sbyong gi lam zhi ba ma 'tshal nas/ rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge sbyong gi dngos po bskyed
223a2(mdo sde): pa gang lags pa de 'chags so// kun rdzob la 'jug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan gang dag bsags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dus byas kyi bde bar gyur te/ 'dus ma
223a3(mdo sde): byas las shin tu ring du gyur pa gang lags pa de dag 'chags so zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar thog mar byang chub sems dpa' bag la nyal dang bcas pa dang
223a4(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / 'phang pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / gnas pa dang bcas pa dang / rten
223a5(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa'i chos thams cad bshags par bya'o// de la 'di lta bu'i sdu ba dang / spros pa dang bcas pa kun tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sdig pa bshags pa
223a6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa yin te/ 'di ni bshags pa'i phung po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshigs 'di skad ces 'das pa
223a7(mdo sde): dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
223b1(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang ldan pa rnams kyi rab de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung / sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa rtsa ba mchis shing rten ma mchis pas gtong ba rnam
223b2(mdo sde): par dag pa dang / rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims mi zad mi bskyed pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang / dmigs pa las dben pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems kyi ngo
223b3(mdo sde): bo nyid la nges par sems pa'i bsam gtan dang / tshur rol dang / pha rol gyi mthar lta ba rnam par spangs pa'i shes rab rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa dang / spong ba
223b4(mdo sde): nyid kyi rnam pa'i byams pa dang / rnam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje dang / chos la kun tu mi 'byung ba'i dga' ba dang / yal bar 'dor ba ma lags pa'i btang snyoms gang lag
223b5(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // khyim gyi dngos po thams cad bzung ba ma mchis shing yongs su ma bzung ba rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
223b6(mdo sde): dran par gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / ma 'gags pa dang / ma skyes pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / lus dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'dun
223b7(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po lnga po mtshan nyid mchis pa'i dbang po rnams dang / nam mkha' ltar mi thul ba'i stobs rnams dang / don dam pa yang dag par
224a1(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / mi gnyis pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i lam dang / zhi ba'i zhi gnas thob pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol
224a2(mdo sde): ba dang / mthun pa'i lhag pa'i mthong / mngon par shes pa ye shes sngon du 'gro ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // thog ma'i mtha' nas lus kyi ngo bo nyid yongs
224a3(mdo sde): su dag pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa'i ngag rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas la rim gro bgyi ba bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / chos la rim gro bgyi ba chos thams cad
224a4(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba tshogs ma mchis shing yon tan ma mchis pa dang / spyod lam thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'i sdom pa spyod
224a5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa de dag gis chos spyod pa yang dag pa'i sdom pa 'dud thams cad kyis
224a6(mdo sde): mi shigs pa 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ras ma nges pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mthun pa dge
224a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bzang po las dkar po ma lags pa 'gags par 'gyur ba gzhan gang ci mchis pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po 'od gsal ba'i las gang gis byang chub sems
224b1(mdo sde): dpa' de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob pa dang / ma thob pa dang / 'thob par gyur pa de dag thams cad la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo // 'das pa dang / ma byod pa dang //
224b2(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub bsnyen pa de dag gi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
224b3(mdo sde): shes mthong ba zag pa ma mchis pa dang / stobs mi thul pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos chags pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /
224b4(mdo sde): kun tu mi 'byung ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang lags pa dang
224b5(mdo sde): gnyis ma mchis pa'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyun bcos na ma lags pa/ nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa dang /
224b6(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / brjod pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la shes
224b7(mdo sde): pa snang ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // sems can thams cad la phan gdag pa'i slad du/ thabs mkhas pa'i gnas
225a1(mdo sde): pa dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'amayongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste//
225a2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du de dag la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang / bgyis par 'gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom
225a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa sems can thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams dang / dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams
225a4(mdo sde): dang chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / log pa brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa'i brgyad pa rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i
225a5(mdo sde): rigs la gnas pa'i rigs kyi sa pa rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rgyun las bzlog ste/ zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang du yang mi 'gro ba rnams dang / phyir mi//
225a6(mdo sde): 'ong ba 'di nas shis phos nas der gnas par gyur pa rnams dang / dgra bcom pa grangs ma mchis shing skye ba ma mchis rab tu phye ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rang sangs rgyas rten
225a7(mdo sde): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo khong du chud pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mngon sum du rtogs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems sa dang mtshungs pa'i
225b1(mdo sde): sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i//
225b2(mdo sde): chos las 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
225b3(mdo sde): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rjen pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag dang / 'dus byas las yongs su rgal pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // 'das
225b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom
225b5(mdo sde): pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i dngos por gyur pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen pa dag lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi
225b6(mdo sde): rang ba mchog dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang gnam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi chos dang //
225b7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / blu na mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi/
226a1(mdo sde): rang ngo // ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226a2(mdo sde): phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas zung du 'brel par ma chags par spyod pa shin tu spyad pa spyod pa rab tu mkhyen nas/ mkhyen pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon sum du
226a3(mdo sde): mdzad nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid de dang chos nyid des rjes su slob de bzhin du/
226a4(mdo sde): bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang //
226a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi chos dang ldan pa dang / bla na med pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi
226a6(mdo sde): bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de
226a7(mdo sde): bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis shing / grangs ma mchis pa rnams su bla na med pa
226b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos thams cad ma dmigs nas/ bdud bzhi pa'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa/ brjod du
226b2(mdo sde): med pa'i chos skyon ma mchis pa rnyes pa/ yi ge dang / brjod pa dang / skal pa thams cad dang bral ba/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyes pa thabs mkhas pas chos bzung bar
226b3(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i slad du/ ji tsam du brtags pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du thugs rje chen pos chud ma gzan pa/ bskul ba'i sa la bzhes pa cang ma gsung ba la
226b4(mdo sde): dgyes pa byang chub kyi shing la gzigs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams
226b5(mdo sde): cad kyis mngon par bstod do// dgyis shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
226b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo mi 'jug pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mngon par mi 'grub pa'i 'khor lo dang /
226b7(mdo sde): tshu rol dang / pha rol yongs su gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i 'khor lo dang / bdud phyir rgol ba choms pa'i 'khor lo bskor du gsol
227a1(mdo sde): brjod du ma mchis pa'i rnga brdung du gsol/ sgra ma mchis pa'i dung bud du gsol/ chos shes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang rtogs bsgreng du gsol shes/
227a2(mdo sde): rab dang / ye shes dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin bsdus par gsol/ chos po'i chen po'i chu'i char pa'i rgyun gyis
227a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo rtogs rnam par spel du gsol/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi nor gyis sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad du
227a4(mdo sde): gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bskul ba'i phung po kha nas ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
227a5(mdo sde): dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs
227a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa/ legs par bgyis pa'i chos kyi rgyun mi mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu lung bstan pa dge 'dun 'phags pa rab tu gnas
227a7(mdo sde): pagadul ba'i sems can dag gshin btul ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba shin tu 'chol ba/ chos bzung ba 'dzin par mdzad pa'i slad du yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su mya
227b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'das par bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i tshul gyis/ ji ltar de dag mi skye ba ma skyes pa de bzhin du/ ma 'gags mi
227b2(mdo sde): 'gag 'gag par mi 'gyur bar bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsol ba 'debs pa yod pa ma yin pa/ len pa
227b3(mdo sde): med pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces ma mchis bzhin du bdag gis mgos phyag bgyis pa dang //
227b4(mdo sde): bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'chags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang //
227b5(mdo sde): bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa de yang ma mchis pa len pa ma mchis pa 'dus ma gyis pa'o// de ltar phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'chags pa dang /
227b6(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa de yang ma mchis pa len pa ma mchis pa 'dus ma bgyis pa ste
227b7(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang len pa ma mchis pa/ 'dus ma gyis pa ste/ chos nyid de dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / ma smad pa dang / mnyam pa ma
228a1(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / mi thob pa dang / mi dma' ba'i yongs su bsngo bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la chos phra rab tsam yang //
228a2(mdo sde): mi dmigs par yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// mig gzugs rnams la mi 'jug ste/ gzugs kyang mig la ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu
228a3(mdo sde): rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa de yang mig las ma byung / gzugs las kyang ma yin te/ byung nas kyang zhig cing med de mi gnas so//
228a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du rna ba la ma yin/ sgra la ma yin/ sna la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ lce la ma yin// rol ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ reg bya la ma yin te/
228a5(mdo sde): yid chos rnams la mi 'jug/ chos rnams kyang yid la mi 'jug mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu chen rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ de yang yid las kyang ma
228a6(mdo sde): byung chos las kyang ma yin te/ de ni byung nas zhig cing med de mi gnas so// de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub la mi 'jug/ byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la mi 'jug mod kyi/
228a7(mdo sde): 'on kyang byang chub kyi rkyen gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems skyed pa rnams skye'o// de mi yang mi gnas pa ste/ skyes nas zhig cing med do// de la sems gang gis dge
228b1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag phan tshun du 'brel bar mi byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na
228b2(mdo sde): me ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs te/ byung nas kyang zhig cing med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi me yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi / 'ongs shes kyang dge
228b3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba la rten nas 'bar te/ byung nas zhig cing med do// ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par chos rnam par byed pa de lta bu dag la blo rnam par mi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang
228b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yongs su sngo ba'o// skyon med par 'jug pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / bzod pa snang ba'i ye shes thob pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi blo rnam par mi dpyod pa gang
228b5(mdo sde): yin pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du byas te/ yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
228b6(mdo sde): rgyu mthun pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su sngo bar bshad pa de bzhin du/ thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi des yongs
228b7(mdo sde): su sngo'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas phung po gsum pa'i bsngo ba 'di bshad pa na
229a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la dma' 'char bar gnas pa yang
229a2(mdo sde): mgu'o// sa dang mi dang l+h+wa ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pas bshad pa la mngon par bsod do// 'phags pa
229a3(mdo sde): phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas bstan la phab pa/
229a4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra ti thA na ma ti pa ri prid tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba
229a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na
229a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong gnyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
229a7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas
229b1(mdo sde): chos bston to// de'i tshe tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba dang /
229b2(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log
229b3(mdo sde): su song ste phyin nasabacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lon gsum bskor ba byas nas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig/
229b4(mdo sde): tu 'dug go/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
229b5(mdo sde): nga sa la btsugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bla ma'i mchog/
229b6(mdo sde): khams gsum pa'i dam pa/ byang chub kyi bsod nams kyi lhag pa'i gzhi/ sems can thams cad nges par sgrol bar mdzad pa/ kun tu khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phyogs su
229b7(mdo sde): thugs pa ma mchis pa nges par thob par mdzad pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus snyigs ma'i snyogs pa lnga dang ldan pa la sdug gsum 'bar zhing / rab tu 'ab/
230a1(mdo sde): la gcig la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang na/ gang nyes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na/ gtso bo ma mchis shing de gang gi
230a2(mdo sde): yang ma lags pa dang rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis gnon te/ phan tshun mi mthun zhing gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa dang / de dag gcig la gcig/
230a3(mdo sde): g.yul 'gyed pa na/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang / de las bzhan pa yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi ming yang mi gda' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsod nams kyis mthus
230a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul thob pa dang / de dag kyang phyi rol gyis gos ngur smrig tsam dang / khong pa'i nang gi 'dun
230a5(mdo sde): pa dang rnga zhe sdang dang / shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi mthun pa la/ gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs par bgyid pa dang / skyon sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / yon tan nges par sbed par bgyid
230a6(mdo sde): pa dang / nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pas non cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / de dag shi pos na yang ngan song gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i
230a7(mdo sde): dpal yang ma 'tshal ba dang / tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ yid du mi mchi ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mthong lags/
230b1(mdo sde): so/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam nas rnam par bzlogs nas bsod nams kyi gzhal med khang thob par bgyi/
230b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa'i blo gros de
230b3(mdo sde): ltar khyod seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing / de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la chos zhu bar spro ba skyed pa legs so legs so//
230b4(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros sems can rnams gang thob nas/ legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas/ dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing // don
230b5(mdo sde): thams cad 'grub par gyur pa'i chos de dag khyod zhus shig/ zhus nas kyang the tsom med par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das laspobs pa'i blo gros
230b6(mdo sde): kyi zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni/ lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni mi rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni sems can dmyal ba
230b7(mdo sde): rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni rigs 'thon po rnams su skye ba 'gyur/
231a1(mdo sde): gang dag gis ni bran dang bran mo rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni mi rnams kyi nang du sems can skyes pa rnams skal pa zang /
231a2(mdo sde): por 'gyur zhing / khyim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri bda' ba dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / lus dang sems shin tu tha mal du/
231a3(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur/ las gang dag gis ni sems can rnams mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi//
231a4(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdugs pa dang / kha dri mi bda' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma lags pa dang / nyes byas kyi las thams
231a5(mdo sde): cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni legs par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ba/ dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi
231a6(mdo sde): ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du/ rgyun tu sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs
231a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / de dag las chos thos nas yid dga' zhing / ci bsam pa bzhin du don yang 'grub par 'gyur/ bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa
231b1(mdo sde): lags na/ 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das gsol pa ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan
231b2(mdo sde): pa dbang dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la lkog tu ma 'gyur ba'i spyan dang ldan pas/ rnam par phye ste rgyas par lan stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spong
231b3(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros khyod kyis ji ltar zhu ba zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam par phye ste bshad kyis nyon gcig/ tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis
231b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa'i blo gros sems
231b5(mdo sde): can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ lha nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi gnod pa med par sems can rnams yongs su skyong bar
231b6(mdo sde): byed cing / bzang po dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs par mi byed cing / bkren pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pas yongs su gtong bar byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi chung ma la
231b7(mdo sde): spyad pa rnams kyang yongs su dag pa yin te/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin/ gso sbyong la brtson zhing bden pa smra ba yin/ rang bzhin du 'dug cing rang gi skyon tshad med/
232a1(mdo sde): pa spong bar byed la/ myos par 'gyur ba'i gtung ba spangs pa yin te/ las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams lha'i lus thob par 'gyur ro//
232a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// srog chags gsod las ldog par byas pas lha dang mi dang lha mi rnams// 'jig rten du ni mi thub
232a3(mdo sde): lus can tshe ring nad med 'gyur ba yin// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can shis ldan dri med rdzogs pa'i lus// lha nang rab mchog de yi longs spyod sna tshogs de yi dpal can rtag/
232a4(mdo sde): tu 'byung // khor ma thag tu lha nang rtag tu lha'i dbang phyug rnams su 'gyur// bsam med bsal ba 'phrogs pa rnam log rin chen longs spyod rnams dang ldan// rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu yid
232a5(mdo sde): dga' dpal ldan gzhal med khang gnas shing // rtse zhing dge ba'i dpag bsams shing yul nags na me tog gtor lus ldan// mkhas shing 'dod pa mi phan yongs spangs dri mchog dam
232a6(mdo sde): pa'i lus dang ldan// tshe rabs kun tu dpe med gser mchog lus ldan zhing rab tu mdzes// rtag tu lha yi nang du bskal pa bzang thob lus las 'od 'byung gyur// lha mo sna tshogs tshogs
232a7(mdo sde): kyis bskor cing 'dod pa'i dpal la spyod par byed// sngon chad cho ga bzhin du ngag skyon bzhi spangs kha ni dri zhim ldan// gsal zhing 'thogs med mi 'jigs tshig mchog lha rnams 'dir ni
232b1(mdo sde): nges par 'byung // yang dag lan 'debs rnam bsgrags snyan cing skye bos shin tu tshig bzung 'os// pi wang rol mo'i sgra 'byor sprin sgra skad snyan pho brang 'khor skad ldan// ma rmongs
232b2(mdo sde): sems kyis myos 'gyur ma legs brjod byed spangs pas lhar 'gyur zhing // grags med dge ba'i lha yis mchod pa lha yi gnas na gnas par 'gyur// blo dang ldan zhing lus brtan yid//
232b3(mdo sde): bzang bag yod kun dang ldan par 'gyur// de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa brjod par byed// gal te tshe zad lha yul nas lhung ba yi lha rnams de tshe smad// sdig med lo
232b4(mdo sde): brgya nyi shu 'gro na lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de ni dam pa dpal ldan lus 'od can// lha rnams lam sel byed cing lha rnams bye bas mchod de bstan
232b5(mdo sde): par 'gro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal to// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams/ mi rnams kyi nang du
232b6(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byas pa bzo bas byin pa dang bkren pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug bsngal bas las kun 'ged pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ma nyams par
232b7(mdo sde): bsten pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis sems can le lo can rnams dge ba'i chos la spo bar byed cing / nges pa'i sems kyis
233a1(mdo sde): gus pa dang bcas pa/ mthun par 'dzin pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams mi nyid thob par 'gyur zhing / longs spyod/
233a2(mdo sde): kyang chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / mdzes pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
233a3(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sbyin pa byin pas mi yi rgyal po dam par 'gyur// rtag tu longs spyod 'byor dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur// lus ngan po dang mtshungs par
233a4(mdo sde): sbyin dang spyod par byed// rigs dang dam pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// tshul khrims ma nyams de ni dkon mchog mchod par byed// nyes byas yongs su spangs pas shin tu nges
233a5(mdo sde): po ste/ tshe ring dam pa thob pas 'chi 'pho med pa yin// bde ba thob pas skyon med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa'i mi ni pha rol sems 'khrugs ma byas shing // gzhan dag rnams kyis/
233a6(mdo sde): gnon byas phyir na gnod mi dbyed// de bzhin tshig ngan brjod kyang gshe bar mi byed pas// dge ba'i mchog gi tshul thob nas ni mdzes par 'gyur// brtson 'grus bzang la lhag pa'i bsam
233a7(mdo sde): pas sems dkar zhing // stobs dang gzi brjid chen po dge ba rnams dang ldan// dmag dpon nyid kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur bas na// longs spyod 'byor pa'i spyod yul ldan pas lhang
233b1(mdo sde): ngar 'gyur// mi 'phrogs sems ldan mkhas shing shin tu mthun pa sa// byas pa gzo gang las la 'dod pa rab tu byed// dkon mchog gsum dang ma la sogs la mdzod
233b2(mdo sde): mdzad pa// nam yang kun la the tsom byed par mi 'gyur ro// mi gang khyad par 'phags pa dge ba lnga po rnams// byed pa de ni sa yi bdag por rab tu 'gyur// stobs la sogs
233b3(mdo sde): dang gzugs dang longs spyod mi zad ldan// grags ldan shin tu gtso bo rnams kyi rim gro byas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka'
233b4(mdo sde): stsal ba/ spobs pa'o blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes par 'gyur zhing skyes nas kyang de dag tu bskal pa bye ba
233b5(mdo sde): mang por gnas par gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la dad par mi byed la/ kun tu bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod
233b6(mdo sde): pas skur pa 'debs par byed cing / 'phags pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'jig pa dang / bar gyi dus na yang dge slong dang dge sbyong
233b7(mdo sde): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang zag zhi po mang por mi gus pa/ mthun par mi 'dzin par 'jig rten gyi smra ba lhur len pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrogs
234a1(mdo sde): par gcig la gcig nyes rtsom gyis gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gis rgyal po dang / rje dpon dang blon po dang / pha dang bu
234a2(mdo sde): rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun pas mi gus pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
234a3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la bsten nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ bdag nyid dge slong yin par khas 'che zhing / dge ba'i chos
234a4(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrub pa la mi gnas la/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams mgu bar mi byed cing / dka' blo mi bde la mthun par mi 'dzin cing yang dag par rjes su bstan kyang
234a5(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa la/ sgrub par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed la/ bdag la bstod par byed/ gzhan la smod par byed cing / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang /
234a6(mdo sde): dregs pa'i shas che la/ bla ma rnams la brnyas par byed/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing / skur pa yang 'debs par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can
234a7(mdo sde): las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes nas kyang ji srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig
234b1(mdo sde): pa ma byung ba de srid du gnas par gyur zhing 'jig pa byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe//
234b2(mdo sde): der yang 'jig pa byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ kun tu 'jig
234b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na/ sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'khyam zhing / sdug bsngal nyams su myong la byung ba'i mtha' med do// de nas
234b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rmongs pas thog ma med nas 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal bying gyur pa'i// 'jig rten sangs rgyas yon tan
234b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho khas len mi byed de/ de ni kun rig ma yin rnal 'byor rgyal po ma yin zhes// bdag nyid chung bzod skye bo gzhan rnams la yang slu bar byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod
234b6(mdo sde): rten 'byor pa sdug pa'i mchog byas na// dge ba chung ngur 'gyur zhing 'jig par byed pa'i char 'gyur zhing // mi dge 'di ni mngon sum dge ba mdun na yod bzhin du// 'on kyang sdig pa
234b7(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu spyod par byed// bar ma rtsod pa'i dus 'dir bzhi po bkres pas nyam thag pa// phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin pas bkrugs shis bla ma smod par byed// 'khor du
235a1(mdo sde): 'dus pa 'dul ba'i dga' ba 'di ni rnam pashigs pas// mi bzad ro med log par lhung ba'i sar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal po pha dang sring mo spun dang
235a2(mdo sde): gzhon nu bu mo rnams// byams pa'i yid ni log 'gyur longs spyod rnams la brkam chags te// byis pa bu rnams thams cad gcig la gcig ni bzhad gang byed// log lhung
235a3(mdo sde): dam pa rnam par 'byings par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus 'dir gang dag shin tu sdig can sems can rnams// mthun par mi 'dzin dge sbyong kha dog 'dzin pa gzugs mi sdug
235a4(mdo sde): ngan pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa sdig pa khrag khrig byed 'gyur ba// de dag shi phos nas ni sdig pa rtsod pa'i mchog gis gnon// mi yis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sdig pa lnga po dag
235a5(mdo sde): bsgrubs shis byas pa dag ni bshags par nus pa ma yin te// gang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig gis kyang bskyabs par mi spyod pa'i// mi ri drag po mnar med pa yi mer ni sreg par 'gyur//
235a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni dud gro'i rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/
235a7(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ dang po 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / chom rkun dang / gzhan gyi bu lon blangs nas/ gnod sems su byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma dad pas dam pa'i chos ma
235b1(mdo sde): yin pa nyan par dga' zhing / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pa la dga' bas log pas 'tsho ba thams cad la dga' ba ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang /
235b2(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams ni/ dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs
235b3(mdo sde): pa la dga' ba'i mi rnams ni// bu lon byin pa rnam par blangs nas mi gzhan gsod par byed// srog gcod pa la dga' ba'i ri dgas 'chi bdag rgyal po rnams// rgya la sogs pas bzung
235b4(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams la gsod par byed// dad pa la sogs dman pa'i blo gros dkar po'i 'du shes can// nag po'i dpag tu med pa bdag cag spyod pa mi shes pa// rmongs pa rnams ni/
235b5(mdo sde): dam chos dkon mchog gtam la dga' mi byed// 'jig rten zhugs pa'i chos la 'dir ni rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar gang ri las 'dir kha ba bab dang rab bab pas// chu yi
235b6(mdo sde): chu yi shugs kyis 'phral du sa 'og 'gro ba bzhin// lha'i mi'i grong du sdig pa'i phung po mang du byas pas na// rmongs pa rnams ni de bzhin dud 'gro rnams su myur du 'gro// rta dre'u
235b7(mdo sde): rnga bong glang chen ba lang ma he seng ge dang // wa dang sbrul dang phags dang khyi la sogs par gyur nas su// rtswa za ba dang sha dang bdud rtsi lo ma'i zas za zhing // de dag rtag tu gzhan
236a1(mdo sde): gyi khur khyer byed cing dub par 'gyur// bkres pas zil gyis gnod pas gcig la gcig za lhur byed pa// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su'ang nam
236a2(mdo sde): yang thar bar mi 'gyur zhing // ci ltar rgya mtsho gcig na ru sbal mig ni gcig yod pas// gnya' shing bu gang mgrin pa gtad par mi nus pa// de bzhin lha dang mi dang dbang phyug/
236a3(mdo sde): che nyid bde bla ga tu// log par lhung ba brgya yis thob par nus pa ma yin te// sangs rgyas 'od gzer dam pa'i tshogs can dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' khyu
236a4(mdo sde): mchog 'od kyis de dag 'byin par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga
236a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams ni/ yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ dang po bkren zhing chags pa dang / mun pa mun nag chen po'i gshes gnyen dang / gsogs pa/
236a6(mdo sde): gyur byed pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang longs spyod par mi byed pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir phrag dog dang / ser sna lhur byed pas spun dang sring mo dang / bu dang / chung
236a7(mdo sde): me dang / bran dang / las byed pa dang / zho shes 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / 'brel pa dang / sbyin gnas dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
236b1(mdo sde): bkren pa thams cad la rab tu sbyin par mi byed cing / pha ma dag la yang rab tu sbyin par mi byed pa dang / nges par bsrung bar 'os pa dag mi skyong la bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / bla ma/
236b2(mdo sde): la mi gus la gces par mi byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag ldan pa rnams ni yi dgas rnams su skyes par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
236b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bkren pa'i nyes pas bcom pa nor gtong mi phod pa// de dag gzhan dag las ni blang bar 'dod par byed// mdzod
236b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni sgo 'phar dam du bsdams pa rnams// 'dir ni bskyang 'os tsa lags mchog rnams gso mi byed// gzhan nor chud gson pa yis rtag tu skrag pa rnams// bla ma la yang de dag
236b5(mdo sde): rab rtsub byams can min// de dag bdag gi chung ma la sogs g.yogs tshogs la// dbyig sbyin mi byed shin tu snying rtse shes med cing // dkar po dag las log pa de dag 'di nas shis
236b6(mdo sde): 'phos nas// yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug bsngal yi dgas 'gyur// de nas lo brgya rnams su rmi lam rmis par yang // dgos dang zas dang btung ba nam yang rmi mi 'gyur//
236b7(mdo sde): khab 'dra'i kha dang ri chen lta bu'i lho can rnams// nyam thag shar dang nub kyi rgya mtshor rgyug par byed// kha nas me 'bar lus ngan phyogs dang lho phyogs gzhan// bskam par mthong
237a1(mdo sde): nus rin chen me rnams lhung bar 'gyur// gshin rjes pho nya dpung mgo las grub rab tu ga cing // sra ldan rnams kyis mnan nas zangs bzhun bzod/
237a2(mdo sde): dka' bar// me 'dra ro bro med pa de dag rnams la ldud// rmongs rnams yan lag brgyad ldan chu bzhin 'thung bar byed// nang khrol lus kyi khong pa bsregs pa bsil ba'i
237a3(mdo sde): rlung gis su// skyes pa'i bdag nyid rnams la stobs chen yang sdug byed// de nas sho phos mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams// rigs dang longs spyod lus g.yog
237a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi dman par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan
237a5(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin bdag gis 'jig rten thams cad la gnod sems med par 'gyur ba
237a6(mdo sde): dang dkon mchog gsum dang / pha ma la gus pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i bzod pa dang nges pa dang / shin tu gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam pa sna tshogs
237a7(mdo sde): klog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba la brtson pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur ro//
237b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgu bka' stsal to// bsam byas gang dag bsod nams tshogs pa bskal bzang sbyin pa'i cho ga bzhin// kun tu//
237b2(mdo sde): sems can mang la kun bged de dag rtag tu nad med 'gyur// tshe dang kha dog stobs ldan lus can 'jig rten mchog tu 'gyur// mtshungs dang rgyal chen khyab par can gyis
237b3(mdo sde): mdzes brjod rin chen ri dbang bzhin// 'dul ba nyam dga' dkon mchog mtshungs med pha ma rnams la bsnyen bskur bas// shin tu rgya chen gtso mchog khyim du skyes pa grangs med
237b4(mdo sde): skye bos mchod// shin tu nus kyang yid 'khrug rnams spangs kun tu gzugs kyis 'phags pa rnams// 'jig rten rnams kyi mig tu sdug pa skal bzang rigs ni 'thon por 'gyur//
237b5(mdo sde): gang dag brtan zhing kun bzod shin tu yid bzang dkar dang mthun rnams dang // mi rnams gang dag shes rab dag mchog sangs rgyas gsung la kha don brtson// de dag 'byor pa thob nas
237b6(mdo sde): rigs mchog skyes pa kun tu kun mchog mdzes// de dag dge bas rgyas pas lus chen rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du spa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang spobs pa'i
237b7(mdo sde): blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bran dang bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma rnams la
238a1(mdo sde): migus pa dang / rgya nom pa'i sems pa yin pa dang klog pa med rnying cigar sdig pa spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs pa dang / bu lon 'phrogs/
238a2(mdo sde): nas bdag sbed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
238a3(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams rgya chen 'byor pa gangs 'od lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas// blun po gang dag rgyags khengs dregs pas dkrugs
238a4(mdo sde): shing gus par mi byed la// pha ma rnams la rmad byung byin gnas 'dra bar 'du shes mi byed pa// de dag nyes pas gzhan du 'jig rten dbang 'gyur dman zhing g.yon can 'gyur// dkon
238a5(mdo sde): mchog mtshungs med rnams la ma gus lhur byed ma rung brlangs tshig 'gyur// gang dag byams dang de bzhin snying rje'i ma lus dge bcu chud gzon pa// de dag grangs med skye bar 'dzin med
238a6(mdo sde): gzhan 'joms ngo tsha mi shes shing // mi yi yul du bran nyid spangs nas skad cig gis ni dma' bar 'gyur// gzugs dang dbang phyugs rigs mchog blo bral dman la mos pa'i glen par
238a7(mdo sde): 'gyur// dkon mchog rnams mi mchod pas nga rgyal med cing zhan la mdangs ngan 'gyur// dpal kun med cing ting nge 'dzin bral ba las rnams kyis ni bsdigs par 'gyur// de dag 'jig
238b1(mdo sde): rten kun dga' dga' ston che sogs med cing tshegs kyis 'tsho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// spobs pa'i blo gros sems
238b2(mdo sde): can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni skal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing / khyim khol dang kha dri zhim pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang /
238b3(mdo sde): skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes ci lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang / ma tshangs pa med pa dang / sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig
238b4(mdo sde): dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po dang / theg pa rnam pa gsum po thams cad kyi tshig gi rang bzhin la mi bzod pa med cing / mi smod la mi spong zhing / de dag thams
238b5(mdo sde): cad du bzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton la sogs pa byed pa dang / ngag gi skyon bzhi po tshad med pa rnam par spong zhing / 'phags pa'i lam la skur pa mi 'debs pa
238b6(mdo sde): dang sems can log par sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la snying brtse zhing / yongs su bskyangs pa dang / skyon de las bzlog cing dge ba la dgod pa dang / gzhan gyi skyon mthong ba'i brjod/
238b7(mdo sde): pa yal bar mjog pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ skal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa
239a1(mdo sde): dang kha dri zhim pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / mthun pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / sems mal du gnas pa dang / khro ba med/
239a2(mdo sde): pa dang gnod pa med pa dang / kha dog dang / ldan pa dang / grags pa dang ldan pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bca
239a3(mdo sde): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas sogs la shin tu shas cher gus 'bad pha ma rnams mchod pas// rtag tu ngag skyon kun 'bral 'jig rten dag tu rmad du 'byung bar 'gyur/
239a4(mdo sde): tshig gi yon tan bzung 'os rnga sgrar bcas shing tshe rabs kun tu phan// ut+pal dri dang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan kha yis phyogs su snyan par grags// gang dag bdag byams gzhan
239a5(mdo sde): mtshungs mi phan skyon bsod sdig pa ngan pa las// phral nas dge ba kun la sems can rnams ni spyod du 'jug byed pa// de dag mi yi 'jig rten thob nas skal bzang kun tu thams cad//
239a6(mdo sde): dga'// shin tu yid 'ong rin chen yul can bde gnas sdig las ldog par 'gyur// dam pa'i chos ni bzung dang bstan brtson de sems byed cing nges par 'gyur// 'dir ni sems
239a7(mdo sde): can kun la pha ma 'dra bar byams pa'i sems ldan 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus su lus can kun ni nged kyis rtsa lag tshogs gyur ces// de ltar zla ba lta bu'i sems sbyangs de dag la ni/
239b1(mdo sde): phan par byed// 'gran dregs khyad gsod la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun sun 'byin pa'i// sdig pa yongs su spangs nas dag pa'i yid can skyon rnams kun spangs nas/
239b2(mdo sde): sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas snyan tshogs phan tshun brjod par byed// myur du lha yi dbang phyug mtshungs med thob nas sangs rgyas dge bar 'gyur// de nas
239b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni dam pa thob nas// rtag tu bskur pa 'debs pa thob
239b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / kha dri mi zhim dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin
239b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang / brdzun du smra bas rtag tu gzhan bslu ba'i sems lhur len pa dang / chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam chen po la 'dus
239b6(mdo sde): pa na/ chos kyi gtam de la rnam par smod pa dang / 'tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa dang / dma' ba'i sems su byed pa ste//
239b7(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog
240a1(mdo sde): mi sdug pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// de nas/
240a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sems yid rnams kyis gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas// log pa'i ngag
240a3(mdo sde): dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnam sems dang / lus kyis sdug bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa bar med nyams su myong ba 'gyur// lcags kyi lcags kyus chen po rnon po rnams
240a4(mdo sde): kyis nyam thag lce 'byin 'gyur// gshin rje'i dbang phyug gnas su'ang mi rnams shin tu zangs skol ldan par 'gyur// dmyal bar mi bden tshig can skyes de dag dga' bar yongs
240a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro ltar khe dri mi zhim zhing // 'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong blta sdug ma min rnams su 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mi snyan
240a6(mdo sde): sguskur 'debs rtsod pa'i skyon mang zhing // de dag rtag tu skyon gnas mi ni sa yang mang pos gleng bar 'gyur// sems can brdzun smra rnams kyis tha ma sems dang lus bde ma yin
240a7(mdo sde): phyir/ sngar bshad nyes 'gro de yi 'bras bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur// mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde ba kun la slu byed pa'i// sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten
240b1(mdo sde): 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur nas ni// 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye// de ltar lus can 'khyam pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba med//
240b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyongs dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso
240b3(mdo sde): bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur
240b4(mdo sde): zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / de dag las chos kyang thos nas/ yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du/ byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la
240b5(mdo sde): ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas/ gzhan dag kyang dkon mchog
240b6(mdo sde): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sgrub pa la rnam par 'jogs par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyas la rgya chen po legs par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzug
240b7(mdo sde): byed du 'jugs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon shes shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang bka' blo bde ba dang mthun par 'dzin par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu thog pa med pa'i 'od gzer
241a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i byams pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / ci ltar btsams pa'i mdo grub pa dang / klog pa
241a2(mdo sde): dang kha ton dang / lung mnon pa dang / bshad pa rnams yid la byed pa yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis bar chad med par bsgom pa la mngon par zhen cing sgrubs par
241a3(mdo sde): byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyongs dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang /
241a4(mdo sde): gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du/ bar chad med par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
241a5(mdo sde): 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas/ yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin du/ byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa/
241a6(mdo sde): rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gis chos la
241a7(mdo sde): gnas// de dag nyid kyi sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzugs legs rnams ni byed par 'gyur// mkhas pa rnams ni slob dpon tshig la mchod
241b1(mdo sde): par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyis 'jig rten ma lus la// bdag dang bu gcig byams pa rnams dang 'drar mthong ba// de dag srid pa kun tu mya ngan med nges 'gyur//
241b2(mdo sde): shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // gang dag shes rab rin chen chen po 'byor mdzad rnams// nyin dang mtshan du dge ba kun tu spyod par byed// 'dir ni rmad
241b3(mdo sde): du 'byung ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rnams// 'jig rten mun pa che la snang ba mchog byed 'gyur// kun tu chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas// sangs rgyas lam las mchog ni
241b4(mdo sde): gzhan med par// nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes rab 'gyur/ de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo
241b5(mdo sde): gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chom zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// tshong dpon
241b6(mdo sde): gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang / so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgya tsam de dag ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
241b7(mdo sde): 'khor du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus
242a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis ni/ ci bsams pa gzhin gyis theg pa rnams la sems bskyed do// ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa yang
242a2(mdo sde): thog cing me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas tshong dpon
242a3(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
242a4(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa'i bla ma chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsung pa legs so legs so// chos lnga po de dag
242a5(mdo sde): thos nas/ 'khor 'di yid bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par don grub par 'gyur lags so// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thos nas nag po'i phyogs spangs te
242a6(mdo sde): dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shin brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par spyan 'dren na/
242a7(mdo sde): bdag cag la thugs brtse ma'i slad du/ khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la thug brtse ba'i slad du gnang bar mdzad do//
242b1(mdo sde): de nas tshongs dpon spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom
242b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
242b3(mdo sde): de rang gi khyim du song nas pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ thal mo lkug lhug por sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa
242b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs
242b5(mdo sde): tshod la spyan drangs na/ des kyang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang lags kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dag yang yid dga' ste/
242b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// bu legs so// khyod kyis legs par byas so zhes mngon par bstod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las la spo bar gyur to// de nas
242b7(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros kyi rang gi chung ma dam pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la bsgo ba/ bzang mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
243a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ro brgya dang ldan pa mang po dang / bsod par sbyor cig/ sbyar nas kyang khyim thams cad/
243a2(mdo sde): chag cha ga gdab pa dang / phyag dar bya ba dang / bla re bre ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi gdags pa dang / me tog chal par dgram pa dang / gdug spos dri zhim pos gdug par byed du bcug la/
243a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig pa'i gdan ci 'os thing ste/ mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul ba spyan sngar bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la
243a4(mdo sde): sdod cig ces bsgo ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang nye du dang / rgan rabs la sogs pa dang / lhan cig 'grogs shing ci skad smras pa thams cad byas so//
243a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig turgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal bskyed mos tshal chen po nas/ sems
243a6(mdo sde): can rnams la thug brtse bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol dpal cho 'phrul dang bcas par mnyan du yod
243a7(mdo sde): pa'i grong khyer chen por gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang rim gyi spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim ga la ba der logs su bzhud do// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros
243b1(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das bsu nas mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
243b2(mdo sde): kyi zhab ring ba dang bcas par khyim gyi nang du gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das ni ci 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhugs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun ni ci 'os pa la 'khod do//
243b3(mdo sde): de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang / sras dang / mdza' ba shes dang / slob dpon dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams ni yid dga' zhing 'dud la/ bla ma la gus pa dang
243b4(mdo sde): gces par byed pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa la 'brim par rtsom mo// spobs pa'i blo gros ni/ me tog dang / spos chur bcas pas
243b5(mdo sde): brkang pa'i ril ba thogs nas/ ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal ba'i grogs po gnyis shig/ spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du phyin par gyur nas/
243b6(mdo sde): de nyid las gcig ni dge 'dun gyis nang du zhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / btung ba 'byor tshogs zhes ma smras la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su
243b7(mdo sde): thugs rang ba ma gsungs pas/ de gang gis kyang ci yang mi byin nas/ de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis ci yang ma byin pa ni/ dge
244a1(mdo sde): spong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te/ sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin zhing / snying rje med la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag go// gang de dag la byin yang /
244a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni/ sbyin bdag blun pa ste/ gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ thams cad kyi mgo lcags kyi 'khor los bcad do snyam du sems par
244a3(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag 'byor tshogs zhes byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang bar
244a4(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang / gcig shos 'ongs par gyur to// de nas bza' ba dang / btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa thob nas/ de yid rangs te/ phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug bsngal ba
244a5(mdo sde): bdag la gang dag gis bza' ba dang / btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa sbyin pa ni dge sbyong bdag nyid chen po rnams te/ snying brtse bar byed la sems nye bar zhi ba yin zhing byams pa'i bdag
244a6(mdo sde): nyid can dag go// 'dis ni bdag zhag bdun du tsam par 'gyur bar bya'o// gang 'di dag la byin na/ 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu bdag la sbyin par byed pa ni sbyin bdag chen
244a7(mdo sde): po mkhas pa la ste legs so// gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun du/ bsnyen bskur thams cad kyis rim gror byed par gyur/
244b1(mdo sde): gcig snyam du sems par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod bsol nas/ gsang sder gyur ste/ phyag bcabs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
244b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo deng phyin cad bza' ba dang / btung ba ma blangs pa nyid du rjes su yi rang ba brjod cig/ de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/
244b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bzhug pa sngon
244b4(mdo sde): du mdzad pa'i chos kyi gtam/ sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyes par mdzad de/ gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud do// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshes
244b5(mdo sde): nas/ de nas bzhugs so// de nas sdug bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor khyam khyam ste/ yul gzhan zhig du sdong nas pha zad tshu zad tsam gyis phyogs su nyal bar gyur to//
244b6(mdo sde): der bsod nams kyi las can de la steng gi nam mkha' la grib ma'i don du sprin gyi bla re glog dang rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe yul de na
244b7(mdo sde): rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas so// de na gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yang gzhan med do// de na tshong dpon dang grong mi
245a1(mdo sde): dang yul mi dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor bu na 'khod pa rnams ni/ mtshan mkhan dang / lhas mkhan dang / skar/
245a2(mdo sde): ma dang / bza' spyod pa la ma mkhas pa la/ rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces brtson par 'gyur cing 'dri'o// des smras pa/ skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod do//
245a3(mdo sde): de ni rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa rin thang che ba'i khri stan bzang po gser gyi rkang rten dang bcas pa dang / yu ba nor bu las
245a4(mdo sde): byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang / yu ba gser las byas shing / nor bu dang ldan pa'i rnga ma'i bsil yab dang / spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa du ma dang / me tog dang / rgyan 'phreng dang /
245a5(mdo sde): gos dang / dbu rgyan dar thod dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / spos kyis phur ma dang / slom dag thogs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs dang bcas pa
245a6(mdo sde): dag dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas byung ste/ kun nas de kun tu btsal to// lhas mkhan des sprin gyi tshogs kyis bka' ba'i phyogs de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de dag la smras
245a7(mdo sde): pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag gis sprin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khebs pa dga' zhing bsil ba'i phyogs de mthong ngam de dag gis smras pa/ grogs po mthong ngo // des smras
245b1(mdo sde): pa de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes su de 'dug ste/ de'i bsod nams kyi las kyis grib ma'i don du sprin de dag 'dus so// de nas de dag dong nas/ sil snyan dang /
245b2(mdo sde): glu dbyangs kyi sgras sbran te/ btud de la 'di skad ces smras so// dbang bskur ba ba zhes la rgyal por gyur cig/ des smras pa/ kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ga la yin/ de dag
245b3(mdo sde): gos smras pa/ bsod nams kyi las can khyod de skad ma zer bar/ khyod gdon mi za bar rgyal po bya dgos so// smras pa/ de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas de dag gis gser
245b4(mdo sde): gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de sngan bzang po la 'dug tu bcug nas/ bkra shis thams cad kyis rgyas par byed cing / dbang bskur te/ dbu rgyan dar thod can la sogs pa'i rgyan
245b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis brgyan nas/ shing rta'i mgo logs su gdugs chen po bsgreng ste/ btsugs shing yu ba gser las byas pa nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i bsil yab bdag gis g.yob cing
245b6(mdo sde): lha rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces/ kun nas mngon par bstod de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du khrid do// de nas rgyal po'i shing rta de bsgyur ba'i 'khor
245b7(mdo sde): los bkren pa gcig shos gnyid log pa'i mgo chod do// de nas bsod nams kyi las can de yang rgyal srid la gnas par gyur to// de'i rgyal srid de yang yams kyi nad med pa
246a1(mdo sde): dang gnod pa med pa dang / 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang bar gyur to// rgyal po'i
246a2(mdo sde): ming gi yon tan thams cad 'byor cing ldan par gyur la/ dga' mgur spyod pa de 'di snyam du/ 'di gang gis mthu yin/ bdag gi rgyal srid skal pa bzang po dang ldan
246a3(mdo sde): par 'di gang gis byung bar gyur snyam pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi las ston par 'du byas pa de thams cad rjes su dran no// yang dag par dran nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
246a4(mdo sde): kyi thad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nAg sems can mang po gzhan rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ tshur gshegs su gsol zhes pho nya zhig btang ngo // pho nya btang nas kyang rgyal bu
246a5(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar dang / rang gi khyim gyi bar du bar der/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i lam chag chag btab cing phyag dar byas te/ me tog chal par bkram nas
246a6(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rta babs btsugs shing pog spor dag gis bdugs nas/ mngon par brgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du
246a7(mdo sde): gshegs so// de nas rgyal po de grong khyer gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi dang bcas shing blon po chen po blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas su'o// de nas bcom ldan
246b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis zhabs la me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye mas bsgos pa'i slob ma dpag tu med pas mchod de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la/
246b2(mdo sde): lus thams cad kyi phyag 'tshal nas/ 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la bla ma la gus pa dang / gces par byed pa chen po mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
246b3(mdo sde): gcig tu rang gi khyim gyi nang rin po che chen po thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed mos tshal chen po yongs su bskor bar gshegs su gsol nas/ zhag bdun du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim
246b4(mdo sde): gro byas so// de nas rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas/ srang sder gyur sde phyag bcabs par rig nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir g.yog 'khor dang bcas par
246b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dma' ba dang dbul ba lags na/ bdag gis rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa 'di ga las
246b6(mdo sde): mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na/ sbyin bdag chen po spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des dus
246b7(mdo sde): gzhan zhig na/ rang gi khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdug tshod gsol to// de nas der sdug bsngal ba gnyis bshig lhags shes bya ba nas/ rgyas par snga ma bzhin//
